parts.text: I need compensation for the water damage caused by the purifier leak.
There was a leak from the purifier that caused water damage.
My purifier leaked and now my kitchen is flooded.
I had a major leak from the purifier that flooded my kitchen.
The purifier leaked and caused a lot of damage to my home.
The purifier malfunctioned and leaked water all over my kitchen.
My kitchen got flooded due to a leak from the water purifier.
The purifier caused a leak, and now my kitchen is a mess.
There's water damage in my home because the purifier leaked.
I'm seeking compensation for the flood caused by the purifier leak.
Can you help with compensation for the damage caused by the purifier leak?
My water purifier leaked and caused significant damage.
The purifier leaked, resulting in flooding in my kitchen.
Due to the purifier leak, my kitchen suffered water damage.
My kitchen flooded because of a leak in the purifier.
